description.#cdata-section: Due to ongoing Clipper upgrades, adding funds using vending machines requires holding your Clipper card (not tapping) at the reader, then swipe payment/insert cash, select value, and then HOLD the Clipper card again until the transaction is done. Thank you for your patience.

sms_text.#cdata-section: Due to ongoing clipper upgrades, adding funds using vending machines requires holding your clipper card (not tapping) at reader, then swipe payment/insert cash, select value, and then hold clipper card again until transaction is done. For your patience.
